Posts.EditableText:
Hello,

I tried to search the forums, but maybe I wasn't using the right keywords.

I am having a problem whenever I go to "download" or "publish" my game. It is giving me various "404" type errors (it can't find the page). I have tried 2 browsers with no success.

Is the site having maintenance right now?

Thank you.
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText:
Just to clarify... Here's what I do when I publish.

1.  I go to textadventures.co.uk
2.  I scroll down to the very bottom and find the "Submit a game" link
3.  I go to the bottom of this page and click on browse and locate my .quest file on my PC.
4.  Once I click on that, I then click the upload button just beneath the browse button.
5.  Depending on the size of the game file you are uploading, it can take anywhere from 20 seconds to a couple minutes.

Let me know if this is what you doing.  Thanks!

Posts.EditableText:
Thank you for the tip!

I'm actually trying to get my game from the online version to the offline version or from online editor to published.

I go to textadventures.co.uk/create

Under my game, I click "download" or "publish".

When I do either of these, I get an error such as "Sorry, an error occurred while processing your request." and "Sorry, something went wrong
An error occurred while processing your request.

This has been logged, but it would be really helpful if you could let us know a bit more information about what you were doing - please contact us and we'll do our best to fix things.".

I would like to share it with others and have them "beta test", but it's not allowing me to do either.

Am I doing something wrong or is it a site error?

Edit; I should clarify that I'm able to test play it and edit it just fine.
